tgt_original: sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ- bodhicittaṁ vajraṁ iva kulaputrāḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca draṣṭavyam |
bodhicittavajraścācāryyo dvayameva tadadhikāraṁ yāvat kulaputrāḥ saṁkṣepataḥ kathayāmi |
yāvanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bodhisattvāśca tiṣṭhanti prayanti ca sarve te trikāla- samayamāgatya tamācāryyaṁ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiḥ saṁpūjya sarva- (63)
